maqras.text: 50|27|Tara sahacara sayatana balabe, ‘he amadera raba! Ami take bidrohi kare tulini. Bastuta se'i chila ghora bibhranta [1].
50|28|Allah‌ balabena, ‘tomara amara samane baka-bitandata karo na; ami to tomaderake age'i satarka karechilama.
50|29|‘Amara kache katha radabadala haya na ebam ami bandadera prati yulumakari'o na'i.’
50|30|Sedina amara jahannamake jijnesa karaba, ‘tumi ki purna hayecha?’ Jahannama balabe, ‘aro besi ache ki [1]?’
50|31|Ara jannatake nikatastha kara habe muttakidera---kono duratbe thakabe na.
50|32|Era'i pratisruti tomaderake deya hayechila---pratyeka allah‌--- abhimukhi [1], hiphayatakarira jan'ya
50|33|yara gayeba abasthaya dayamaya allahake bhaya kareche ebam binita citte upasthita hayeche
50|34|taderake bala habe, ‘santira sathe tomara tate prabesa kara; eta ananta jibanera dina.’
50|35|Ekhane tara ya kamana karabe ta-i thakabe [1] ebam amara kache rayeche tara'o besi [2].
50|36|Ara amara tadera age bahu prajanmake dhbansa kare diyechi, yara chila pakara'o karara ksetre tadera ceye prabalatara, tara dese dese ghure berata; tadera kono palayanasthala chila ki
50|37|Niscaya ete upadesa rayeche tara jan'ya, yara ache antahkarana’ [1] athaba ye srabana kare manoyogera sathe.
50|38|Ara abasya'i amara asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera antarbarti samasta kichu srsti karechi chaya dine; ara amake kono klanti sparsa kareni.
50|39|Ata'eba, tara ya bale tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna suryodayera age o suryastera age [1]
50|40|ara tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ratera ekanse ebam salatera pare'o [1].
50|41|Ara manonibesasahakare sununa, yedina eka ghosanakari nikatabarti sthana hate dakabe
50|42|sedina tara satya satya'i sunate pabe mahanada, sedina'i bera ha'oyara dina.
50|43|Amara'i jibana dana kari ebam amara'i mrtyu ghata'i, ara sakalera phire asa amadera'i dike.
50|44|Yedina tadera theke yamina bidirna habe ebam lokera trasta-byasta haye chutochuti karabe, eta emana eka samabesa ya amadera jan'ya ati sahaja.
50|45|Tara ya bale ta amara bhala jani, ara apani tadera upara jabaradastikari nana, kaje'i ye amara sastike bhaya kare take upadesa dana karuna kura'anera sahayye.
51|1|Sapatha [1] dhulijhanjhara
51|2|atahpara bojhabahanakari meghapunjera
51|3|atahpara sbacchandagati nauyanera
51|4|atahpara nirdesa bantanakari pheresataganera
51|5|tomaderake pradatta pratisruti abasya'i satya.
51|6|Niscaya pratidana abasyambhabi.
51|7|Sapatha bahu pathabisista asamanera [1]
51|8|niscaya tomara paraspara birodhi kathaya lipta [1].
51|9|Phiriye rakha haya ta theke ye phire thake [1].
51|10|Dhbansa hoka mithyacarira [1]
51|11|yara sandeha-sansaye nipatita, udasina
51|12|tara jijnesa kare, ‘pratidana dibasa kabe habe?’
51|13|‘Ye dina tara agune sajaprapta habe.’
51|14|Bala habe ‘tomara tomadera sasti [1] asbadana kara, tomara e sasti'i tbaranbita karate ceyechile.’
51|15|Niscaya muttakira thakabe jannatasamuhe o jharnadharaya
51|16|Grahana karabe ta ya tadera raba taderake dibena; niscaya itopurbe tara chila satkarmasila
51|17|tara ratera saman'ya ansa'i atibahita karata nidraya [1]
51|18|ara ratera sesa prahare tara ksama prarthana karata [1]
51|19|ara tadera dhana–sampade rayeche bhiksuka o bancitera haka [1].
51|20|Ara niscita bisbasidera jan'ya nidarsanasamuha rayeche yamine [1]
51|21|ebam tomadera nijedera madhye'o. Tabu'o tomara ki caksusmana habe na
51|22|ara asamane rayeche tomadera riyika o pratisruta saba kichu [1].
51|23|Ata'eba, asamana o yaminera rabera sapatha! Niscaya tomara ye katha bale thaka tara mata'i eti satya [1].
51|24|Apanara kache ibarahimera sam'manita mehamanadera brttanta eseche ki
51|25|yakhana tara tara kache upasthita haye balala, ‘salama’. Uttare tini balalena, ‘salama’. Era to aparicita loka [1].
51|26|Atahpara ibarahima tara strira kache druta cupisare gelena [1] ebam ekati mota-taja go-bachura (bhaja) niye asalena
51|27|atahpara tini ta tadera samane rekhe balalena, ‘tomara ki khabe na?’
51|28|Ete tadera samparke tara mane bhitira sancara hala [1]. Tara balala, ‘bhita habena na.’ Ara tara take eka jnani putra santanera susambada dila.
51|29|Takhana tara stri citkara karate karate sam'mukhe asala ebam tara gala capariye balala, ‘brd'dha-bandhya’ [1]
51|30|tara balala, ‘apanara raba erupa'i balechena; niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna.
